title: My champion is lagging but not in real time?
body: I will get in game and for some reason out of nowhere my champion will not go to where I am clicking, and they will just stand still. No its not my mouse, I have two of them and neither of them is the issue. "Attempting to Reconnect" will appear at the top a bunch and I can not move my champion during this time but I can see everybody else in real time and there is nothing lagging at all. This JUST started happening after the new patch. I need help and answers as to why this is happening. Thank you! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It sounds like you're suffering from input delays and a weak connection, so your network can't communicate what's happening to the servers.  Your best bet is to go over each troubleshooting step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Also sometime if I click on an enemy champion, my champion will follow them and then I just walk under the tower and die, although I am clicking absolutely everywhere else while this is occurring.
